::: Hell Beast, on a comm unit to Mosquitor, ::: Mosquitor, give him a quick 
security check and let him in. I will talk o him.

~~~~~~`

::: Marine watched as the tower they worked so hard on crumble and fall. 
Unfortunetly, the core that pumped the Energon radiation was cracked and it 
was leaking into the small cave. All the bots began to glow with energon over 
loads. :::

::: Marine :: Damn, we'll have to revert to beast mode, or die!

::: Gremlin ::: Argh, the pain!

::: Marine looked to the only entrace, and fired three missles. It hit the 
rock wall and caused a slide that trapped all of them in the small radiation 
filled room. Then, they were forced to change to beast mode or die. :::

::: Pheniox, badly hurt ::: Why did you do that?

::: Mairne ::: Now, there trapped in here...and Hell Beast can send 
reinforcements!
